name: Smartwool Hike Light Crew Socks - Unisex
description: These hiking socks have wool-on-wool reinforcements. An additional layer of wool yarn is used (rather than nylon) to reinforce and strengthen in high-impact areas. It makes them overall more durable, and provides long-term impact cushioning and comfort.Made of 69% wool, 30% nylon, 1% elastic.Ribbed knit leg.Flat knit toe seam.Elasticized arch support helps hold them in place.
